entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Periods of snow over northern sections near noon. Snow level at valley bottom. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Flurries over northern sections in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
